info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 8 at 2:44AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Calcasieu River Near Kinder
Calcasieu River Near Oberlin
Mermentau River Near Mermentau
Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas...
Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake
Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice
Atchafalaya River At Morgan City
Calcasieu River Near Glenmora
Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier
Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage
Sabine River Near Bon Wier
Sabine River Near Deweyville
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Calcasieu River near Kinder.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Lowland sections of Old Pump Road, Kinder Cemetery Road, and Nevils Bluff Road begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM CDT Thursday was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
